title.narrative: GENERATE, ANALYZE, USE AND DISSEMINATE DATA AND KNOWLEDGE

description.narrative: Government at national and sub-national level have strengthened capacity to deliver integrated social protection services, including goods and cash, to the most deprived families, as well as in support of families, including children on the move, during acute emergency and recovery, in line with the CCCs.

sector.narrative: Child poverty analysis towards policy change (Profiling, mapping and identifying drivers of multi-dimensional and monetary poverty of children, modelling and simulation of policy options)
Child poverty measurement: support to routine national measurement of monetary and multidimensional child poverty
PF4C: Budget transparency, accountability and participation

title.narrative: UNICEF Programmes in Afghanistan (Adolescent Health and Development)
Afghanistan Country Programme Document 2015-2019 Results Matrix
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace
UNICEF Tender Notices through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Government at national and sub-national level have strengthened capacity to deliver integrated social protection services, including goods and cash, to the most deprived families, as well as in support of families, including children on the move, during acute emergency and recovery, in line with the CCCs.

description.narrative: As part of the UNICEF's support to the National Statistics and Information Authority (NSIA), to support self-sufficiency in collection, management and production of data/information on children and to strengthen capacity of government to generate and analyse data on child deprivations to improve evidence-based programming. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:29/07/2020

title.narrative: 1.4 Policies and programmes are influenced by analysis and advocacy to reduce child poverty

baseline.value: Child poverty data not in place

target.value: 2021:Child poverty explicitly mentioned in a national social protection policy document

title.narrative: 3.2 Evidence generated on budgets and their linkages to child outcomes to improve budget allocations/expenditure for children

target.value: 2021:Updated set of child focused budget briefs for key social sectors available

title.narrative: 1.2 National government measurement of child poverty using monetary measures

baseline.value: No national government measurement has been undertaken

target.value: 2021:Updated monetary child poverty available from Income and Expenditure Survey

title.narrative: 1.1 National government measurement of child poverty using multidimensional measures

baseline.value: No national government measurement has been undertaken

target.value: 2021:Multidimensional poverty report updated based on Income and Expenditure Survey

title.narrative: Comprehensive risk analysis report in place
Updated conflict analysis report in place
Agreed clear programme recommendations on strengthening ACO disability response in place
Comprehensive situation analysis of children with disabilities in place
